name: TTBC(To The Bloody Core)
description: As part of an intergalactic mining corporation, traverse, mine and most importantly shoot, your way through a series of underground caverns, all whilst being swarmed by hellish creatures from the depths of the earth.  As part of a specialist team, you are equipped for your mission with the capability to mine ammo from your surroundings, and trust me... you're gonna need a lot of ammo..
